name: calorific
description: Calorific is a self-hosted food and calorie tracking application that allows users to log meals, view macros, and track daily caloric intake using a minimalist UI. Designed for personal privacy and self-hosting.
features: Calorie Tracking: Log meals and track daily caloric intake. Stay on target.
Macro Monitoring: View protein, carbs, and fat breakdown. Balanced nutrition.
Meal Logging: Quick entry for daily food consumption. Effortless tracking.
Minimalist UI: Clean, focused interface for easy use. No distractions.
Privacy-First: Self-hosted solution keeps health data private. Your health, your control.
Personal Tracking: Designed for individual health management. Simple and effective.
